textarea.messageLengthError: Your message length is too long. It must be under {num} characters.

auth.closedPopup: In order to access PureCloud's Skype for Business integration, please authenticate with Microsoft services in the provided popup window.
auth.generalError: An error occurred during login. Please try again. If this continues, please contact your PureCloud administrator.
auth.multipleIdentities: An error occurred during login. Please make sure you are only signed into one Microsoft account when accessing this application. You can sign out of all Microsoft accounts and try again.

calls.general: An error occurred while attempting to make a call. Please try again. If this continues, please contact your PureCloud administrator.

login.adminConsentMessage: Are you an organization admin? Give application consent here.
